        public java.lang.String[] doHandshake()
                               throws java.net.ProtocolException,

        Returns:
        a String array with the response from the server split on spaces.

        ServerNotAvailableException

      • readLineFromServer

        public java.lang.String readLineFromServer()
                                    throws ServerNotAvailableException
        Reads and returns one line from the server.
        Returns:
        the line sent by the server.
        Throws:
        ServerNotAvailableException - if IO errors occur.

      • run

        public void run()
        Calls a method to create a connection with the server and send the handshake Checks if returned handshake message means that a game can start or the ClientController needs to wait for a new opponent. Continuously listens input and forwards the input to the handleCommand method.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
